data.market_trends: Current trends show a rise in interest for sustainable travel and cultural immersion experiences among tourists.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers tend to prefer personalized tours, unique accommodations, and local experiences over standard package deals.
data.competitive_landscape: Competitors highlight eco-friendly adventures and cultural tours, positioning themselves as sustainable alternatives to traditional tourism.
data.seasonal_factors: Seasonal influences include regional festivals, which attract additional travelers and enhance the overall cultural experience during autumn.
